mapper.select:
select a.* from sa_user_agent a
and a.principalguid=#PRINCIPALGUID# and a.agentguid=#AGENTGUID#
a.valid=#VALID#
and a.finishdate<#CURRENTTIME:DATE# and a.finishdate is not null and a.valid = 'Y'
mapper.insert:
INSERT INTO sa_user_agent ( guid, principalguid, agentguid, startdate, finishdate, valid,
createtime, createuserguid, updatetime, updateuserguid ) select #GUID:VARCHAR#, #PRINCIPALGUID:VARCHAR#, #AGENTGUID:VARCHAR#, #STARTDATE:DATE#, #FINISHDATE:DATE#, #VALID:VARCHAR:NULL#,
#CURRENTTIME:TIMESTAMP#, #CREATEUSERGUID:VARCHAR:NULL#, #CURRENTTIME:TIMESTAMP#, #UPDATEUSERGUID:VARCHAR:NULL#
mapper.update:
UPDATE sa_user_agent
updatetime=#CURRENTTIME:TIMESTAMP#, updateuserguid=#UPDATEUSERGUID#, AGENTGUID=#AGENTGUID#, STARTDATE=#STARTDATE:DATE#, FINISHDATE=#FINISHDATE:DATE#, VALID=#VALID#
WHERE PRINCIPALGUID = #PRINCIPALGUID#
